data.title: Good Sushi with an "All You Can Eat" Option
data.text: Our sushi-loving family enjoys getting the 3-roll lunch special here. There is a good variety of rolls offered, a decent ambiance, friendly staff, and a great value. Also good to know, the All You Can Eat price is the same at lunch as dinner because they offer the same full menu. Worth a try!

data.title: All you can eat
data.text: I was a little hesitant upon the signage and location of this place, that being said I would go back in a heartbeat. You cannot go wrong with the all you can eat sushi deal and the rolls are amazing do yourself a favor and go!

data.title: Reasonable Sushi
data.text: The sushi was good. Excellent value. The service was friendlt and responsive to our needs. It can get crowded in the evenings.

data.title: Unlikely place for very good sushi.
data.text: Live in the area and have been here many times for dinner.  The sushi is very good quality and tastes great.  The service is usually pretty good.  Sometimes better than others.  Prices are reasonable.

data.title: Great all you can eat!
data.text: We were served by Chuck, it was great. Sushi was great, I enjoyed our time. We will be back. I would recommend the katsu salmon roll if you like salmon.

data.title: Yummy!
data.text: My friend took me to this restaurant, I usually get a bubble tea with my sushi. I'm glad they offered it the way I like it. Our server was awesome and didn't only engage with us, but with every table he was serving even though he was very busy. When I visit I will go to see them again :)

data.title: Great food Casual dining
data.text: I can't begin to tell you all the varieties of California rolls and sushi.  Large and small sizes.  I have not tried the noodle, but they look delicious.  The soups are very tasty.  I love going here and experiment with new flavors.  Many of my friends go to this restaurant and they also love it.

data.title: Great Sushi!
data.text: This is my families favorite sushi restaurant.  The food is always good.  They have great lunch specials, which makes it a great value.  I'm not a fan of sushi, so I normally order their salmon teriyaki, which is very good also.

data.title: First time trying sushi!
data.text: Delicious food and a very nice restaurant! Staff was wonderful and accommodating. Would definitely return when in the area!

data.title: Yummy Sushi
data.text: I didn't( and still don't) know much about sushi but everything I have tried here has been really good. The servers have all been friendly and helpful with suggestions about choices. Come early for dinner because there is usually a wait.

data.title: Good sushi for a great price
data.text: We eat this one a lot!  The good is always good a very reasonable!   All of the sushi rolls are great!  I have never left disappointed.   Try the bar area so you can try many different items!   Great!!!

data.title: Sushi rolls salty and not much fish when you cover up with sauce it must not be good
data.text: Being from the west coast I learned never do Midwest sushi. tasteless salty tiny bits of fish. You could not get cut fish without an extra cost. Beer was cold and good the only plus.

data.title: Get the all-you-can-eat Sushi deal!
data.text: This restaurant is probably one I would not stop by, were it not for the recommendation by our family members.  They have an all-you-can-eat sushi deal that is so great, especially when it is shared so you can try so many delicious types of sushi.  They even have a cheesecake sushi that is a great way to end the meal.  Setting is a bit run-down, but the food makes up for the ambiance.  Service was a little slow, but they were very busy.  I would return!

data.title: Great Surprise not to mention the food!
data.text: Met my daughter here for lunch and the place was packed!  I had no idea this treasure was here.  The food is high end and delicious.  Presentation was wonderful.   I think anyone will enjoy this stop.

data.title: Only negative is how cold this restaurant is in the winter, too cold to eat comfortbly.
data.text: Food is good but expensive.  Very noisy inside you can barely hear the people at your table when they are talking.  Long waits on Weekends with very little area to wait in.

data.title: Very Good, prompt service, and nice a la carte menu
data.text: I ate here for the first time, last week. The place was busy, but then again, not many Sushi places nearby. The parking was hard to locate a spot, and driving around the building, it was poorly lit with the lot filled with potholes. Once inside, I was seated promptly, the atmosphere plain, but service was above average, and the food I would rate as very good, and I was very satisfied with their extensive a la carte menu, as I as not very interested in the all you can eat. Overall, very good!

data.title: No disappointments here.
data.text: Ate here for the first time today. Little nervous as we walked in. The front door needs some attention, but the food did not disappoint!   I had the ginger salad, egg drop soup and Alaska Salmon Sushi.  Wonderful!

data.title: One of my favorites lunch spots
data.text:
The owner of Sushi Mido has figured out how to do it right.
Their lunch specials are tasty and an incredible value. 
The wait staff  is unbelievable,ask for Batman. And oh yeah, the sushi is wonderful.

data.title: Bad customer service
data.text: Went to Sushi Mido today and as we walked in, they sent away our business because they were closing in 10 minutes for an hour and a half. Very disappointed how they handled that and how rude they were that they were closing in 10 minutes and would not serve us. Probably not going to go back because of it.

data.title: Good food, good price
data.text: Went with friends, loved the food.  The servings were large enough the all-you-can-eat menu was not necessary.
